item.description:
A DOG & KID FRIENDLY EVENT

03076 Zip/Postal Code: Map Zip
Local Directions: 93N; exit 3 (Rte 111). Take Rte. 111 west 4 miles to a left on Rte. 128 south 3 miles to the park on left. 1st tee is behind baseball field. Trail into woods for other holes at the store across from the park

Disc rentals at the store across the street from the park for $3. to $5. We will also meet at the store before and after we going into the park. This usually makes things easier.
Host: Cindy 107
Co-Host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

Steve O. ordered a nice day. So, come on out and meet some new and old friends. We will play some disc golf and take a nice walk along the paths thru this wooded park. Disc golf is a sport where you toss a frisbee like discs along a path into a metal basket. Wimp Disc Golf means, we don't count the score. It is all for the fun of getting outside. You don't have to be good at tossing..just come out and have some fun and get some fresh air. We always have a good time just chatting. You can do all 18 holes or just 9. We'll be out for a few hours. then we will head back to the store and maybe get something to eat or drink. There is no charge to play here or to just walk through the woods.

So please join us... remember to wear sneakers or good trail walking shoes, of course some water. The Ticks are still out.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the store across from the park to pick up discs
item.name: Wimp Disc golf
